task.title: Restore the M800 Setup
task.shortdesc: This entry describes how to restore the customer’s M800 meter setup.

context.p: Restoring the M800 setup allows the customer to put the transmitter back into service quickly without having to reprogram it. If the M800’s software version did not allow the files to be stored electronically, use your notes on the customer’s paperwork to manually restore the settings.

steps.stepsection: To electronically restore the setup of an M800 meter:

step.cmd: Use the USB cable to connect the M800 to the computer.
Open the M800 Transmitter Calibration Tool (TCT) program.
Click Open All Transmitter Setup Files.
The program will open the directory. Highlight the folder name stored earlier and OK.
Once the files open, the program will give the message “Open files successfully!” Press OK to continue.
Click Send All Transmitter Setup Files.
The program will return the message "Send all transmitter files successfully!" Press OK to continue.
When the loading finishes, press EXIT then OK to close the program.
